data.what_is:
D*engage: Transforming Customer Engagement through Advanced Marketing Automation

Since 2018, D*engage has been at the forefront of democratizing marketing technology. Our Customer Driven Marketing Platform (CDMP) revolutionizes marketing automation, offering seamless deployment options and a unified customer view for personalized interactions.

With our omnichannel marketing automation tools, businesses can engage customers across email, SMS, in-app messages, mobile push notifications, and more.

Experience the power of marketing automation with D*engage. Visit dengage.com to learn more.
data.product_description: D*engage is a leading provider of advanced marketing technology solutions, empowering businesses to revolutionize their customer engagement strategies. With our Customer Data Platform (CDP) and omnichannel marketing automation tools, we enable personalized interactions across email, SMS, in-app messages, mobile push notifications, and more. Discover the future of marketing with D*engage.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
My journey as a user of D-engage has been truly awesome. The best thing I liked about D-engage is their marketing automation process. It made most of my marketing campaigns a no-brainer.

What do you dislike about D*engage?
There is nothing to dislike about D-engage. It is already providing its users with unique client journeys, and I believe it will continue to do so. I wish it improvises its already existing services day by day.

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Introspecting, planning, strategizing and executing take a lot of time to manage single-handedly when you have other things to focus on in your business. D-engage helped me track my customer data, analyze data and map out marketing campaigns perfectly and easily. And its marketing automation service is a life-saver for my business.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: My journey as a user of D-engage has been truly awesome. The best thing I liked about D-engage is their marketing automation process. It made most of my marketing campaigns a no-brainer.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: There is nothing to dislike about D-engage. It is already providing its users with unique client journeys, and I believe it will continue to do so. I wish it improvises its already existing services day by day.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Introspecting, planning, strategizing and executing take a lot of time to manage single-handedly when you have other things to focus on in your business. D-engage helped me track my customer data, analyze data and map out marketing campaigns perfectly and easily. And its marketing automation service is a life-saver for my business.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Freelance Copy writer and Content writer

initial_reviews.review_title: Want to know your customers, D.Engage is your solution
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
DEngage is an easy-to-use, powerful group of tools for customer engagement and marketing automation, that lets you have an all-in-one solution for your team and company. A great Omnichannel solution.

What do you dislike about D*engage?
Actually, there is little to dislike about this software. Maybe the lack of plugins or templates could be something to address, especially for new users and Do-It-Yourself people. It can be overwhelming for some users less comfortable with software solutions

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
In our business, segmenting and targeting customers accurately is a must. Time is also highly valued, and with this platform, we were  able to do all this, from one software solution, while monitoring the preferences of different types of clients through various platforms without having to log in and out of multiple devices

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: DEngage is an easy-to-use, powerful group of tools for customer engagement and marketing automation, that lets you have an all-in-one solution for your team and company. A great Omnichannel solution.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: Actually, there is little to dislike about this software. Maybe the lack of plugins or templates could be something to address, especially for new users and Do-It-Yourself people. It can be overwhelming for some users less comfortable with software solutions

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: In our business, segmenting and targeting customers accurately is a must. Time is also highly valued, and with this platform, we were  able to do all this, from one software solution, while monitoring the preferences of different types of clients through various platforms without having to log in and out of multiple devices

initial_reviews.review_title: Dengage is the Perfect Omnichannel Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
The best thing about Dengage is that we can now engage our visitors via push notifications, emails, SMS - all from one platform and monitor the preference of different categories of customers across the various platforms without having to log in and out of various devices and then transferring data to Ms. Excel to get insights.

What do you dislike about D*engage?
Dengage does not have a lot of templates for a DIY user. To compensate for this, they provide a high level of personalized support which is really great!

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Dengage for our eCommerce platform to engage our customers via multiple channels. This helps to save cost on customer engagement that we previously spent on Google or Facebook adverts.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: The best thing about Dengage is that we can now engage our visitors via push notifications, emails, SMS - all from one platform and monitor the preference of different categories of customers across the various platforms without having to log in and out of various devices and then transferring data to Ms. Excel to get insights.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: Dengage does not have a lot of templates for a DIY user. To compensate for this, they provide a high level of personalized support which is really great!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We use Dengage for our eCommerce platform to engage our customers via multiple channels. This helps to save cost on customer engagement that we previously spent on Google or Facebook adverts.

initial_reviews.review_title: Overall experience was good with dEngage used it for Email/ Web push automations.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
I think they have amazing support with the right tech people, as they help with integrations and the tool's setup, including creating campaigns. Are always ready to jump on the call and sort out solutions

What do you dislike about D*engage?
The integration takes time as they don't have plugins set up already for major eCommerce platforms, so it takes time to set up. They said they are developing these and if they do, that would give this tool an edge over others.

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
The benefits are creating emails/ web push flows that can help in marketing automation and getting free revenue from the database of users that we have. It also helps in increasing traffic from email and push notifications. A benefit they have over others is that they have email + web push which not many companies with plug and play are offering.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: I think they have amazing support with the right tech people, as they help with integrations and the tool's setup, including creating campaigns. Are always ready to jump on the call and sort out solutions

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: The integration takes time as they don't have plugins set up already for major eCommerce platforms, so it takes time to set up. They said they are developing these and if they do, that would give this tool an edge over others.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The benefits are creating emails/ web push flows that can help in marketing automation and getting free revenue from the database of users that we have. It also helps in increasing traffic from email and push notifications. A benefit they have over others is that they have email + web push which not many companies with plug and play are offering.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
Easy to use and well developed tool for customers. Highly effective use. Simply to upload and use as the program for LMS and uploading courses

What do you dislike about D*engage?
Nothing much on the down side works pretty well. Well developed no dislikes so far.

Recommendations to others considering D*engage:
Great program to use and have customers well engaged

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer tools as engament ans seamless use of program as user friendly

initial_reviews.review_title: The delivery rate is good and the support team is responsive.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
The delivery rate of the Dengage email content is Good. The support team is also responsive.

What do you dislike about D*engage?
A few marketing automation campaigns, like cart abandonment, have to be created in SQL code. This is not possible for every user and has to be improved.

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've improved our user journey and earned an increased revenue via the Marketing Automation campaign setup.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: The delivery rate of the Dengage email content is Good. The support team is also responsive.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: A few marketing automation campaigns, like cart abandonment, have to be created in SQL code. This is not possible for every user and has to be improved.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We've improved our user journey and earned an increased revenue via the Marketing Automation campaign setup.

initial_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive and Easy to Use CDP & Marketing Automation
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
Relational data tables let you segment and target customers accurately.

What do you dislike about D*engage?
Few campaign scenarios rely on JS or SQL knowledge, which we get quick solution from the dengage team.

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dengage covers all of our omnichannel marketing automation needs. Sending messages with predictive web behaviour analysis, using built-in RFM model to activate the customers and flexible content management.

review_question_answers.answer: Relational data tables let you segment and target customers accurately.

review_question_answers.answer: Dengage covers all of our omnichannel marketing automation needs. Sending messages with predictive web behaviour analysis, using built-in RFM model to activate the customers and flexible content management.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
Performance and scalability, easiness of integration

What do you dislike about D*engage?
No real problems currently. At start phase of the product, it hasn't ready for extremely high load

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation of email marketing with extremely high load (millions of emails per hour)

review_question_answers.answer: Performance and scalability, easiness of integration

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Automation of email marketing with extremely high load (millions of emails per hour)

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
API for pushing data to the platform....

What do you dislike about D*engage?
tedious when describing columns to be used for an automated job

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reaching out to customers using various mediums using one platform

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: API for pushing data to the platform....

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: tedious when describing columns to be used for an automated job

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Reaching out to customers using various mediums using one platform

initial_reviews.review_title: Are you loooking for a user friendly platform? This is it!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about D*engage?
Admin panel is so easy to comprehend and so easy to use to complete desired tasks.

What do you dislike about D*engage?
Not being able to see some values (contact information) already on the database.

What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We track and manage all our communications with contacts through D.engage platform including e-mail marketing and web site visits.

It is a great tool for customer segmentation and sharing relevant content accordingly.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: Admin panel is so easy to comprehend and so easy to use to complete desired tasks.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about D*engage?
review_question_answers.answer: Not being able to see some values (contact information) already on the database.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is D*engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
We track and manage all our communications with contacts through D.engage platform including e-mail marketing and web site visits.

It is a great tool for customer segmentation and sharing relevant content accordingly.
